title: 2 girls ‘forcibly undressed in MCD school’ in Delhi, no arrest so far - The Indian Express
content: 2 girls ‘forcibly undressed in MCD school’ in Delhi, no arrest so far  The Indian ExpressView Full coverage on Google News
description: Delhi Police said they have registered a case under sections of the POCSO Act and raids are being conducted to arrest the accused. They said a case was registered the same day.
